preferences.title: Center SVG files
preferences.description: Put SVG files in the center of the page
preferences.name: centerSVGcenter

preferences.title: Display gray background
preferences.description: Display gray background (default for other types of images)
preferences.name: centerSVGbackground

author: tobbi
name: centersvg
description: Adds a grey background to SVG files and centers them, just like normal images.
